attributes.action: Ban smoking around young people. They do not have a voice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concered about seeing people pushing prams or buggies with babies or young children in and they are smoking. Do they not know the harm that they could cause the baby or young child. I am an ex smoker and there is enough information these days about smoking. People should be able to make the choice whether to smoke or not. It is enjoyable for many. Good luck to them. They are adults though.
